Key Match Events: James Rodriguez scored one goal and set up two more as Colombia thoroughly dismantled Panama in a 5-0 win.
Jhon Córdoba scored the opening goal at 8 minutes.
James Rodríguez scored a penalty at 15 minutes.
Miguel Borja scored a penalty at 90'+4 minutes.
Post-Match Reflections: Herculez Gomez commented that James Rodriguez is the best player in the tournament.
The victory allowed Colombia to advance to the Copa América semifinals.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at State Farm Stadium in Glendale, Arizona.
